comment: The value of the ` Z/nZ ` structure. It is defined as the quotient ring ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , with an "artificial" ordering added to make it a ` Toset ` . (In other words, ` Z/nZ ` is a _ring_ with an _order_ , but it is not an _ordered ring_ , which as a term implies that the order is compatible with the ring operations in some way.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
